div.h3: The Scarsdale Public Schools seek to sponsor each student's full development, enabling our youth to be effective and independent contributors in a democratic society and an interdependent world.

div.p: The Scarsdale Public School district is committed to making our website accessible to all visitors, including users who have disabilities. If you experience any difficulty in accessing any content on our website, please contact us at webmaster@scarsdaleschools.org.
div.a: Click to read the full website accessibility statement.
